item.title: Merchant Crab A LitRPG Adventure - H0st
item.description:
Shared by:h0ser
Written by H0st Read by Johnathan McClain, H0st Format: M4B Bitrate: 64 Kbps Unabridged Merchant Crab A LitRPG Adventure Written by H0st Narrated by Johnathan McClain . An unlikely protagonist leads this hilarious new LitRPG, perfect for fans of Heretical Fishing, Chrysalis, and Lunadea! Join this unexpected merchant on his penny-pinching quest for riches and sweetness! Balthazar was just a random giant crab [...]
